author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
Replace the frozen version version of the 50ns HLT menu in the release: instead of the latest and greatest menu that we had included before (but at the end never used because of the problem with the solenoid) another version was chosen which is more similar to the one applied mostly during the data taking at 50ns.

It has to be merged on top of #9878: once that PR will get merged, this one will only need the HLT signature The menus used for RelVal or MC productions are not touched, even for the 50ns menu. The new frozen menu will simply stay in the release, and can be used for possible MC productions that want to compare with the 50ns data.
title: Legacy 50ns frozen HLT menu in the release 74X
